en: South Africa Basic Survey Unit Albers 25E: Albers Equal Area (South_Africa_Basic_Survey_Unit_Albers_25E)
Came into use from 2019-01-01. Use is extended northwards into neighbouring countries to include the river catchment areas of the Orange/Gariep and Limpopo rivers.
